command.text:
if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'hrEmployeeOvertimeRegister', 'New') = 0 return if charindex('''', @ma_nv) > 0 return if len(@ma_nv) > 3000 return
declare @refDept varchar(128), @q nvarchar(4000) select @refDept = bp_ref from hrbp where ma_bp = @bo_phan
create table #t (stt_rec char(13)) set @q = 'insert into #t select a.stt_rec from hrnv a left join hrbp b on a.bo_phan = b.ma_bp' set @q = @q + ' where b.bp_ref like ''' + @refDept + '%'' and (a.ngay_nghi is null or a.ngay_nghi >= ''' + convert(varchar(8), @ngay_tu, 112) + ''')' if (@ma_nv <> '') set @q = @q + ' and a.ma_nv in (''' + replace(replace(@ma_nv, ' ', ''), ',', ''', ''') + ''')' exec sp_executesql @q
delete #t where stt_rec in (select stt_rec from hrdktangca where ma_ca = @ma_ca and ma_ca_ct = @ma_ca_ct and ((ngay_tu between @ngay_tu and @ngay_den) or (@ngay_tu between ngay_tu and ngay_den or @ngay_den between ngay_tu and ngay_den))) insert into hrdktangca (ma_ca, stt_rec, ngay_tu, ngay_den, ma_ly_do, ma_ca_ct, so_phut_tt, so_gio_td, ma_tang_ca, ghi_chu, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select @ma_ca, stt_rec, @ngay_tu, @ngay_den, @ma_ly_do, @ma_ca_ct, @so_phut_tt, @so_gio_td, '', '', getdate(), getdate(), @@userID, @@userID from #t drop table #t
